title: Bake a New Recipe
description: Try baking something new, like a chocolate lava cake or cinnamon rolls.

title: Start a 5-Minute Dance Party
description: Put on your favorite song and dance like nobody's watching!

title: Paint Something Abstract
description: Grab some paints and a canvas (or paper) and create a masterpiece with no rules.

title: Frying Plantain
description: i want golden ripe dodo with beautifully fried sauce

title: Try a New Coffee/Tea Recipe
description: Experiment with a new way to make coffee or tea—maybe a dalgona coffee or chai latte?

title: Have a Picnic Indoors
description: Lay out a blanket in your room, make sandwiches, and have a mini picnic at home.

title: Do a DIY Spa Day
description: Face masks, foot soak, and relaxing music—pamper yourself at home.

title: Watch a Movie From a Different Genre
description: Pick a movie you wouldn’t usually watch—maybe a documentary, classic, or foreign film?

title: Make a Random Playlist
description: Create a playlist with songs that match a random theme (e.g., 'Road Trip Vibes' or 'Songs With Colors in the Title').

title: Learn a Magic Trick
description: Look up a simple card or coin trick and impress your friends later.
